short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort and organize your browser tabs across windows and groups. Data is 'local-first' so uninstalls will remove suspended urls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly sift through all open windows and tabs to quickly locate the ones you need while efficiently discarding those that are no longer relevant.
